ARABIC: إِن يَشَأْ يُذْهِبْكُمْ أَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ وَيَأْتِ بِـَٔاخَرِينَ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ ذَٰلِكَ قَدِيرًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Mankind! if He wanted, He could remove you altogether, and produce others instead. Allah certainly has the power to do that.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: He could take you away if He will, O men, and replace you with others: God has the power to do so.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: If He wills, He has the full power to remove you, O mankind, and bring in others in your place.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Had God wanted He could have destroyed you all and replaced you by another people; He has the power to do so.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: O people! He can remove you and bring others, if He wills; and Allah is Able to do that.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: If He wills, He can take you away, O people, and bring others. And Allah is Ever All-Potent over that.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: If He please, He can make you pass away, O people! and bring others; and Allah has the power to do this.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: If He will, He can put you away, O men, and bring others; surely God is powerful over that.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: If He will, He can remove you, O people, and produce others (in your stead). Allah is Able to do that.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: If He wanted, He could remove you altogether and replace you with other people: He has the full power to do so.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: If He will, He will take you away, O mankind! and bring forward others; and over that Allah is ever Potent.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: If He wishes, He will take you away, O mankind, and bring others [in your place]; Allah has the power to do that.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: If it were His will, He could destroy you, o mankind, and create another race; for He hath power this to do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: If He wills, He can take you away, O people, and bring others. And Allah is Ever All-Potent over that.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: O people, if He will, He could make you extinct, and bring others. Surely, Allah is Powerful over that.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: If He wills, He can do away with you, O people, and bring others. God is Able to do that.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: If He wills, He can do away with you, O people, and bring others [in your place]. And ever is Allah competent to do that.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [4:133] If He will, He can remove you, O people, and bring others, instead of you, surely God is ever able to do that.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (If He will, He can remove you, people) He can destroy you, human beings, (and produce others (in your stead)) create different beings who are better and more obedient than you. (Allah is Able to do that) He is Able to destroy you and create different beings instead of you.
